Mod.Name: [Tsunamods] Poly-UP (Character Models and Textures)
Mod.Author: Slimebucket + Digixu + AxlRose + Megachocobo
Mod.Description:
New version 4.1 now out! Rinoa Eye fix, Pumpkin Head Quistis fixed, Kid Squall fixed
Poly-Up is the one stop shop for Character enahncements. Use this mod over Rebirth Flame.
Rebrith Flame does not use better models, and is just a texture replacement mod,
Poly-Up replaces Models, Textures, weapons, and even some NPCs!
- Replace all Main_chr poly models with their hi-res Textures. - 8x (1024x1024) Upscaled Textures by Magochocobo *used with permission

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes:
Version 4.1 - Rinow eye fix, Pumpkin head Qusitis fixed, Kid Squall fixed Version 4.0 - New Gunblade textures for Squall - New Cloudie McDoom costume for Squall Version 3.2 - minor fixes to Squall and Laguna. Version 3.1 - preview pics added to config menu for main characters - Fixed texture issue with UNIFORMED Quistis. No more PUMPKIN QUEEN - Fixed MORE eyes on many characters - fixed a few of textures sized wrong
Version 3.0: - Eye fix 2.0 is here! random artifacts from eyes has been fixed - Many textures have been replaced. The textures where a mix of both Mago and Devina edits, replaced all Devina textures to MAGO ones to make everything uniform and the same
